page.title: 04LITTLE WITLEY LIFE - W.I.
page.content: { }Little Witley{Women's Institute}was formed in 1948 and at present has a membership of 42 with a committee of 10.{Meetings}are held on the second Wednesday of each month at 7.30 p.m. After the business a speaker is invited and subjects range from Wood Turning to Matterhorn Adventure. A Mini-Produce{Show}is held at the annual meeting in November and two cups (owned by the Village Hall Committee) have been kindly donated. These are awarded to the winner of the flower arrangement and to the member gaining most points in the remaining classes. Two{fund raising events}are held annually; one a Barn Dance and the other a Jumble Sale. Carol Singing takes place just before Christmas and the money usually goes to a Charity for children.
